moves.1. d4 Nc6 2. d5 Nb8: I have not seen anything like that before.  Development delayed two moves...
This move cuts the rooks protecting each other.  Be2 looks better to me.
moves.22... Qf6: I think black anticipated Nc7, forking the black rooks.
moves.23. Re1: That is going to hurt real bad.
moves.23... Qxa1 24. Nxd6: Why not fork the rooks?  Is Pe4 so valuable?
moves.24... Re7 25. Kf1 Qe5 26. Nb5 a6 27. Na3: Any trade increases black's advantage.  This trade also doubles white's pawns.  I like Pd6 better, though black Pb5 prevents promotion.
